definition: Junggar Basin, northern Xinjiang
to allow/to grant/in accordance with/in the light of
accurate/standard/definitely/certainly/about to become (bride, son-in-law etc)/quasi-/para-
phonetic ga (used in rendering Tibetan and Mongolian sounds)/Tibetan Ge: language of Buddha/(dialect) final particle similar to 了[le5] (esp. in Yunnan)
variant of 爾|尔[er3]
thus/so/like that/you/thou
basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]
earth/ground/field/place/land/CL:片[pian4]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: The Mengku region is located at the southern foot of the Altay Mountains to the north of the Junggar basin.
sentences.chinese: 新疆蒙库地区位于阿尔泰山南麓，南接准噶尔盆地。

sentences.english: The southern edge of Junggar Basin, is the The only access to the North Road of Silk Road.
sentences.chinese: 准噶尔盆地南缘，是丝绸之路北道的必经之地。

sentences.english: Three anticline zones developed on the south margins of Junggar Basin.
sentences.chinese: 准噶尔盆地南缘发育三排背斜带。

sentences.english: Finally, after contractive uplift in Miocene, Present Junggar Basin was formed in the end.
sentences.chinese: 最后在中新世时萎缩上隆，形成了现代的准噶尔盆地。

sentences.english: Xia 40 well area in Zunger Basin has tight reservoirs.
sentences.chinese: 准噶尔盆地夏40井区储层致密。

sentences.english: The Yongjin Oilfield had been explored to be a large oilfield with in-place volume of hundreds millions ton in Junggar Basin.
sentences.chinese: 准噶尔盆地永进油田为储量规模上亿吨的整装油田。

sentences.english: The late movement makes oil and accumulation possess late period forming in the Junggar basin.
sentences.chinese: 晚期构造决定准噶尔盆地南缘具有晚期成藏的特点。

sentences.english: Lithologic trap is the most important type of traps in Shawodi area of Junggar basin.
sentences.chinese: 岩性圈闭是准噶尔盆地沙窝地地区最主要的圈闭类型。

sentences.english: A computation example of Zhungeer basin is given in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 最后列举了准噶尔盆地的计算实例。

sentences.english: The paper discusses the analyzing results of mineral compositions of 87 sand samples from 9 des- erts in the Jungger Basin.
sentences.chinese: 对准噶尔盆地87件沙漠沙矿物分析结果进行了研究。

sentences.english: The tectonic evolution and hydrocarbon accumulation in the foreland fold-and-thrust belt of the southern JunggarBasin is complex.
sentences.chinese: 准噶尔盆地南缘前陆冲断带构造演化与成藏过程复杂。

sentences.english: Decision tree and utility theory are used to evaluate the hydrocarbon re-sources of the Junggar Basin.
sentences.chinese: 决策树和效用理论已应用于准噶尔盆地油气资源评价。

definition: Tarim Basin depression in southern Xinjiang
Gurbantunggut Desert, northern Xinjiang

definition: Tsaidam or Qaidam basin (Mongolian: salt marsh), depression northeast of the Plateau of Tibet, located between the Qilian Shan and the Kunlun Shan at the northern margin of the Tibetan Plateau.
Taklamakan Desert, Xinjiang
pinyin: Ta3 ke4 la1 ma3 gan1 Sha1 mo4

definition: Altai mountain range in Xinjiang and Siberia
Altai mountain chain on the border of Russia and Mongolia
the Tarim Basin in southern Xinjiang
Kumutage (or Kumtag) Desert, northwestern China
pinyin: Ku4 mu3 ta3 ge2 Sha1 mo4

definition: the Turpan Depression in Xinjiang
Pamir high plateau on the border between Xinjiang and Tajikistan
the Yili basin around Urumqi in Xinjiang
Manas River, Xinjiang
Irtysh River, flowing from southwest Altai in Xinjiang through Kazakhstan and Siberia to the Arctic Ocean
Karakorum mountain range in west Xinjiang
Ulungur River in Xinjiang
Bayingolin Mongol Autonomous Prefecture in Xinjiang
